website_summaries.verdict: The best space-saving vacuum that comes in a pack of several different, helpful sizes for use.
pros: Double-zip seal and triple-seal turbo valve get every ounce of air out of the bag
Assortment of bag sizes is great for long term storage or travel needs for clothes
Bag lining helps to prevent mold and mildew from growing on the inside
cons: The large bags can re-inflate depending on how much you stuff the inside of the bag

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful... at first.
customer_reviews.text: These are everything they promise to be! I used them to unclutter my closet. I placed the bag in the chest I wished to store my clothes in THEN vacuumed and it shrunk to just the right shape. UPDATE Alas! Several months later even the small bags won't stay sealed. Such a useful tool, if only it functioned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good, when they work. Customer Service is BAD.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had to write a bad review before, and I hate to do it. These bags are great, when they work. Unfortunately, 2 of my Jumbo bags didn't work properly. I contact support due to the lifetime warranty claim. They actually did respond and ask for more information. Oddly, I had already given them that information in the original request form, but I supplied it anyways. After that, they never got back to me. I attempted to contact them multiple times, and was ignored. So, at the end of the day, don't expect them to honor the warranty. Because in my experience, they simply won't.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product, first time using this brand
customer_reviews.text: Great product, first time using this brand. I put puffy comforters in the jumbo ones three weeks ago and they're still perfectly deflated. Smaller ones have also kept their seal, same time frame. I have in the past used "the OTHER brand" and they never kept a seal. Once stacked them on a shelf, they inflated and I had a hard time getting them out ! These Space Saver brand bags are the best ! Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: bjh in TX

customer_reviews.title: Great job and value
customer_reviews.text: Really do the job! I had lots of extra bedding to put away after the holidays that are only used once or twice a year. I purchased the set with many sizes and was able to now put away them on one shelf in my linen closet instead of stuffing them wherever there was room. No more shifting them around! I will use the smaller ones for packing extra towels, plus for travel. I cannot wait to put my fleece sheets in one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for 5 months so far with no issues
customer_reviews.text: The variety of sizes is nice. I just took out winter clothes after having them packed up for about 5 months and none of the bags lost their vacuum seal. Easily compressed shirts by about 60% and sweaters by 75%. I bought a few re-useable silica gel packs and threw a few into each bag with a dryer sheet and the clothes smell just-washed instead of like stale air. Would be nice if there were some sort of attachment to get a better seal on a hose to use with a vacuum. I felt the hand-pump had a better vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Diem

customer_reviews.title: Bad Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I need a replacement and I've tried their website and it doesn't work. Keeps coming up as word press. How do you get a replacement? How do you contact them? I've read others have the same problem. Warrenty is no good!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My husbabd is in the military and is leaving for a six-month deployment. There are certain things that he is going to need like blankets and pillows that are very bulky. I looked on Amazon, and these bags had awesome reviews. Last night my husband was filling up bags with his blankets and pillows, sheets and towels. He kept telling me how awesome the product is and how thankful he was that I purchased them! They are easy to use and save A LOT of room!!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the XL bags, but they are holding really well and both swallowed up a ton of bedding without issue. I was able to use the hand pump to remove almost all of the year, but it's definitely much faster to utilize a small vacuum if available. It's also really tempting to keep stuffing things into the bag past the stop line, but since there's twelve bags there should be plenty of storage available without using them outside the recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well, this my very first written review on an item purchased at Amazon. And it is well deserved. I purchased these bags to replace my very old original brand Space Bags. First thing I noticed was the material of the Space Savers bag is much much better than that of Space Bags original brand. The 12 piece box is the way to go when making this purchase. I am planning on using the small bags to pack my suitcase for my business trips. Also, the seller's follow up to the purchase is outstanding and very sincere. I know if I ever have an issue with my purchase I can count on a great customer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: LIV

customer_reviews.title: The Bags Do Not Hold Airtight
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving 1 star here because I cannot give zero stars. I ordered 12 of these bags and had 11 of them leak air back into the bags. I resealed and vacuumed the air out twice more for each leaked bag, carefully following the reseal insrructions. They still leaked. Only 1 bag held any vacuum after 2 days. Unless I want to reseal the bag every 2 days, I had to find another vendor. This is not the worst product I have bought on Amazon, but it is in the bottom 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in the process of moving and needed this to eliminate some boxes and totes. So glad I made this purchase, And it didn't just as it said. I ordered the 12 pack that came with 3 sm, 3 med, 3 lg, 3 jumbo. I used every single one of them and I am currently in the process of ordering more. I only have one bag that continues to re-inflate but I'm not sure if that's me or the bag. Since there is a lifetime warranty I'm not to worried. Delivery was a little annoying but that was Fed-ex and not the shipper. Overall I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Medschool

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work properly
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome when they stay sealed and compressed, however more than 50% of the bags I used were reinflated by the next day. The material is really crinkly so I'm dubious that they can be reused without tearing and I think a bunch of them are tearing themselves the first time I use them. I'll use vacuum bags again in the future, but probably a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Jim Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Literally a space saver.....
customer_reviews.text: Wow - what a space saver. I didn't quite get how it would work with a vacuum but its flattens pillows, comforters and I'm really looking forward to traveling - this will make it easier to stay with on piece of luggage. I was not sure how big the bags would be so the variety pack is perfect. Works as promised. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lauramye

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best buy ever! I used the large bags to store away my large/heavy winter blankets, extra pillows and heavy sweaters. It took some maneuvering to get the items into the bag, but it was very easy to use. Also, it really does condense the size of your items into one flat piece that can be stored either in your closet or under your bed. No leaks so far. I may use the smaller bags for when I travel to save space in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: jkim023

customer_reviews.title: work the first time, most of the time
customer_reviews.text: the product says lifetime guarantee. I used them to move in march and they worked great. some of the bags didn't hold air the first time I tried to use them. which is why I say they work the first time, most of the time. Im moving again and theyre not holding air. I stored them properly. I contacted the company which says that they will expedite new bags. the guy promptly contacts me back. a week later, I have no bags and no response from the guy. im moving! very disappointing. i've made 3 orders of the bags totally over $100 and no the poor quality ziplock bags aren't working....#eyeroll.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie L Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay sealed.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a great fix for storing clothes. I have used other bags of this type. These are the worst. Out of the 12 bags, 2 weeks after sealing then 1 bag is still compacted. The seal just doesn't hold on these bags. For about half of them, you could tell the seal was faulty immediately, they would begin hissing beore you could even get the cap on them. Others I thought had held because at 24 hours they were still solid. Alas, going back to the closet they have fully expanded. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Views

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut down the volume in my linen closet. The bags are thick plastic, and the vacuum valve works well with either the hand pump or a vacuum hose (the hand pump is obviously slower, but still effective). The pictures are of two queen-sized plush blankets that are identical (except for color) so you can see the difference in size before and after. The zip-seal is effective, but sealing it with my fingers was a little easier than using the plastic "closer" thingy. Not a huge deal, though. Definitely will be using all of these, and maybe getting more for winter coats, extra towels, and anything else bulky that I don't use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Packing for college? These are a must!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the big move from home to college dorm and we couldn’t have done it without these bags. Time saver and well as space saver. Saved us from several trips carting multiple loads. Saved space in the car for more items to be packed. We filled several and would highly recommend. Photos posted with review show an entire twin xl bedding with huge pink 24x24 pillow and several smaller throw pills aaaand room for a few clothing items. Will use again for packaging student up and bring home in the spring. Don’t second guess, just buy.👍
customer_reviews.author: Bwise1203

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I moved across country and needed to pack a lot of stuff into a little space so I bought these to try to condense my clothes. They worked great! They really truly saved a lot of space and held up very well. I moved again about of year later and had saved the bags and used them the second time around and they worked well at first but then the air leaked out and the bags expanded. They still worked well for packing but they didn’t save much space the second time around. I would recommend these bags but I’m not sure about their utility for repeated uses.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S.

customer_reviews.title: Only 7 of 12 bags work, dont waste your time on this
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, unless you are ok to get around 50% bags working. I receive the box without any damage, and still got some defective bags that inflate in a few hours. I got 12 bags and this were defective: 1 medium, 3 large and 1 jumbo do not work and are useless as any other plastic bag. It took me about a month to star using the bags and realize they did not work. Will try to contact seller or customer service to see if this have more than the typical 30 day return policy. Just very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: These bags puff right back up in hours time
customer_reviews.text: The bags do not stay sealed. I've tried out 3 different bags, paying careful attention to the instructions and the process, and all of them puffed bag up in hours time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheather LLC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased several sets of these bags for moving and ended up returning all of them. The first box we received only had 3 small and 3 medium in it - so the large and jumbo were missing. Amazon did send a replacement for the missing bags. We picked the bags per the instructions on Friday and by Saturday morning when we went to move, more than half of the bag had reinflated! It was a huge pain and waste of time and effort. We returned every one originally purchased! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space out how many you do at once with a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing for items of mine that are going into storage! I was impressed at how large the jumbo was because it even fit my giant throw pillows and comforters. I didn’t use the smaller bags yet, but I plan to put clothes in there just before I move. One concern I did have about the bags is just the wear and tear on my vacuum. I have a nice shark vacuum and after doing about 3 jumbo and 4 large bags I lost suction for a couple hours. I think I just overheated the motor but it might not be the best idea to do to many at once. Overall I’m very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time and in good condition. I immediately tackled my daughter’s closet and had everything under control in no time. I was able to condense 6 large trash bags of stuffed animals in to two of the jumbo bags and one of the large bags!! The pump that came with the package didn’t seem to be doing much so I pulled out my vacuum and sucked all the air out. It is amazing how much stuff you can put in the bags! I will be reordering! Thanks for the great product!😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Jolene F.

customer_reviews.title: DESPITE EFFORTS, ALL BAGS REFLATE!
customer_reviews.text: these are the worst storage bags I've ever encountered. Despite careful and precise attention to detail instructions ensuring a proper seal, ALL the bags that I've tried have reflated within a few hours. So disappointing and I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These definitely work as advertised. You can condense an entire storage tub full of clothes into a bag that shrinks down to no more than a few inches tall. The one caveat would be to definitely use the little tool that they give you to seal the bags. Out of the first six or eight bags that I sealed, four or five of them ended up getting air inside, and puffing back up. I resealed them, and pinched them together using the little plastic tool that they give you, and it’s been good ever since.
customer_reviews.author: petro277

customer_reviews.title: Not Airtight - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Following their instructions carefully, I've been unsuccessful it keeping bags "deflated". After about a week, all my sealed bags re-inflated with air which defeats the purpose of saving space leaving with me with some expensive plastic bags. Today I gave it one more shot, re packing them even, careful not to overfill and sealing them tight. Within 15 minutes, one bag had inflated again. A second was starting to inflate again. And the third started to inflate after about 20 minutes. Too late for a refund and I doubt I could return used product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Acid PopTart

customer_reviews.title: So far,  the best vacuum bags I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've used a couple different brands of bags before these with varying success. So far these bags have been flawless. After a few weeks there had been to loss of vacuum. The seal feels very secure. The valve works very well and has a screw cap which i like. I've used a couple of the smaller ones while traveling and they fit in a carry-on perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, essential for small space storage
customer_reviews.text: The bags are easy to use and are very handy. I was able to vacuum seal and store four heavy, wool blankets, two cotton blankets, multiple minky blankets and throws, all of Mayhem’s winter clothes, most of my winter clothes, all of Husband’s hunting season uniforms, and some vintage linens in the jumbo and large bags, plus a medium bag. That means I still have five of the small and medium bags left.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Bought multiple boxes!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are okay, and are a great space saver if you can get them to work properly and get ones that aren't defective. I bought a few, and found multiple bags did not hold the "Vacuum" very well. You need to make sure that the bags are "zip locked" properly, and even then there were several defective bags among the multiple boxes I bought. I bought about 15 bags worth, and got about 4 maybe 5 that did not hold the air properly. The large bags are great, we use them to store entire bed linen sets, including the comforters. If you can get a whole box of quality working bags, then that's great for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got these in the mail today and am loving them so far! It reduced my memory foam pillows to the thickness of a novel! They are made of pretty thick plastic and have double zips to ensure airtightness. It comes with a hand pump, which is amazing since I don’t have a vacuum. I love that this comes with 3 small, 3 medium, 3 large, and 3 jumbo! I attached pictures showing the size compared to a 25 inch suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Liang

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I feel like some of the bags are faulty. And they have guaranteed replacement but still haven’t heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal campos

customer_reviews.title: My husband fell in love
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible! They added so much space to our cupboards. The hand pump was so easy to use. We could fit 2-3 huge blankets in the jumbo, 4 sets of King sheets in the large, 2 huge bath robes in the medium and 3 twin sheet sets in the small. Granted we did not try to stuff them, probably could’ve fit more. Added so much space!!
customer_reviews.author: a raven & her writing desk.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hold much.
customer_reviews.text: The concept for these is great. I have been able to reduce space that seasonal items take up, however, it isn’t that much. I notice they tend to not lay flat once the air is sucked out. You can manipulate them a little bit not much. I will use them since if nothing else, they keep the items clean while stored.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Do not attempt to purchase any other brand. Take it from this Martha Stewart-wanna-be that you do not want to waste your time, energy or money on any other brand. These are durable, well made. I have never been so pleased with these. All the other brands I've tried have ripped or punctured TOO easily. I use them for out of season apparel, bedding not being used - HUGE deal for me. I like to switch out my comforters and bedding to the seasons and if I didn't have these bags, I would not have room to store my bedding that is out of season. LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: Shocked and 100% Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I used the SpaceSaver first at home for bedsheets, seasonal clothes, etc. and I had no problem. The real test was when I went on a month-long trip abroad, where I was NOT settled in one place, and we were moving to a new place every 2-3 days, which means I had to use the manual pump frequently. Thankfully I had absolutely no problems with any of the plastic bags or the pump! Also, I was able to pack enough clothes for an entire month without the NEED to do any laundry, while my friends had to do their laundry at least once a week even though their bags seemed as fully-packed as mine was!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell if these hold up
customer_reviews.text: Living in a 1906 farmhouse with no closets or storage, these are a life saver. I usually buy the Space Bags from Walmart, but they always fail. I am trying these and see if hold up for multiple fills over time. One thing you should know - I had 1 large bag not sucking the air out at all. I thought it was defective or had a puncture. I then noticed a nylon outer down vest was right under the circular vent - moved it down and it worked fine. So don't put anything nylon or not breathable next to the cap area.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Awkerman

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I used 3 jumbo bags and 2 large bags for 8 totes of seasonal clothes, coats and snow pants. 3 HUGE totes and 5 regular size ones. Most clothing was children's but I was very happy with results. The black piece that came with it to suck air out didn't function so I used my vacuum. Worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Stays sealed no matter what!
customer_reviews.text: I moved across the the country and used these bags! I put every article of clothing I owned in them, suctioned them, and put them in a Tule for 900 miles. This includes dirt roads and temperature changes! When I got to my destination, they were still vacuumed and sealed. These are well worth the money and everything was fresh. When I moved in I was able to unseal them and just put together my closet. Such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great but reinflated within days.
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed amazing. I put the stuff in, sealed them, and vacuumed the air out. The results seemed amazing. Until a few days later they were completely inflated again. I thought maybe I did something wrong even though I followed the directions. I took a few things out in case I put too much in then resealed again. Seemed to work. Everything was as sealed as I could get it. This time it didn’t even hold the day. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: karate

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other storage bags and all of them loose there shape after a few days and need the air suctioned out of them. These do not. The Jumbo can accommodate a king size comforter and are large enough to simply fold the comforter and slide it into the bag. The clips are a little difficult to attach to the bag but then I'm thinking putting them on the bag might make the difference in how they keep the air out. I had a chest full of large blankets some more stacked on top along with pillows for guests, thanks to these bags they all fit in the chest now. Great Buy - Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Doesn't stand behind warranty
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of sitting in storage, 4 of my bags deflated with no sign of damage. I tried to replace them with no luck and had no response from Spacesaver to help me replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So I had read the reviews before making my purchase and was well aware that defective bags was a great possibility, nonetheless I decided to purchase because they’re the best rated vacuum storage bags I could find. Needless to say, I’m super happy with my purchase. I had several bags come defective, but I contacted the seller and they were more than happy to send me replacements at no extra cost so if your undecided on whether or not these bags are worth all I can say is that they are. The customer service makes it 100% worth it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem to stay sealed
customer_reviews.text: First, 3 of my bags arrived damage probably due to the shipping that amazon won’t let me post here on this review. Anyways even after I tried to love them. However, the product that was actually usable, it hasn’t even been a week yet and 2 have already filled back up with air. Did not over pack or anything one was a jumbo with one blanket and the other was a small with beanies and scarfs. Wasn’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kylei

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use/Easy to Fill!
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer. Very impressed! I got the variety pack. The Jumbo holds A LOT but it's SO heavy & hard to hide. The best place to store that is under the bed (if you don't have small dogs/cats that love to chew on crunchy plastic). The Small held 3 T-Shirts & 2 light Sweaters and there was still room for another sweater or 2-3 more T-Shirts. The Small & Medium were easy to store. I think next time I'll just buy a box of Small & Mediums.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Watt

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the trouble
customer_reviews.text: Two years in with these bags and I'm not happy. ALL of them leak. Early on I had the company send replacements because some of them were clearly leaking. They sent me out a whole new replacement set. Now the ones that I thought weren't leaking PLUS the ones in the new replacement box all leak. Just opened my storage to find all of them, top zipper perfectly closed and cap perfectly aligned, ALL full of air. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Allie D

customer_reviews.title: Not all bags work
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I purchase these bags. The first set was great at first. I was really excited about the convenience of the bags until the larger bags were inflating again. I thought it was a user error and left it alone. I went ahead and purchased them again. Well I had the same issue with the second set. Not only that the pump stop working halfway of the second used. I love the bags just wish that the larger bags would work. Also a better pump
customer_reviews.author: NG Maltos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the size! Large is readily a medium and medium a small. In the process of moving and ran out of hefty (best) and ziplock (next best), so when I saw this and for the piece I hopped on it. If I didn't need them since I'm losing time with packing, I'd return. Five for ease of use, the for traveling since I'm required to use more bags due to the size. And if course one for storage size.
customer_reviews.author: SnowPea M.

customer_reviews.title: TRULY SPACE SAVING
customer_reviews.text: These space saver bags have helped open up so much more space in my storage closet for other things and were easy to use, so I’m extremely satisfied with this purchase overall. So far, I’ve only used about 2 jumbo bags, 1 large bag, 1 medium bag, and 1 small bag which contain a total of 3 full-size comforters (with all the pillow cases, bed sheets, etc. that came as sets), 6 extra bed sheets/pillowcases, and 6 pillows. And because the space saver bags really flattened everything out, I was able to store all of these into a single storage bin. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: datgworl

customer_reviews.title: Great for deployments
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think this would actually help me, but boy was I wrong. I bought sheets, pillows, a mattress topper, and a comforter. I managed to fit all of them in one military issue duffel bag. It was amazing to see my 2in twin mattress topper shrink to a manageable size. It also did wonders for my uniforms making them easy and neat to stack into my duffel. Wonderful product. My only issue was that I did find one bag that wasn't able to hold a vacuum for more than a few hours. I plan on getting a replacement for that. Otherwise, they worked great never even needed a vacuum just used the included hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Penjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this comes with 4 different sizes. I've received several defective ones but able to resolve it quickly. Very commendable customer service and very prompt addressing queries you have for them. I just hate the fact that my 2 vacuums aren't compatible to this and been pumping out air manually which is exhausting. Haha. Hoping these would last me for years.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Failing bags
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to get ahold of this company, but all of my jumbo bags have failed as well as a few large. I'm not over stuffing. We are a military family that is depending on this space as we have to travel often. I went to look at the few bags we have been counting on, no problem. I looked tonight, the essentials are all blown back up. I dont know what to do. I do know it has messed up travel plans and we will feel the effects for our entire trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Essential for travel
customer_reviews.text: We took a16 day cruise and didn't want large suitcases so we used these and were able to fit everything into two carry on size and one medium case. The pump works fine but we stopped our room steward and he loaned his vacuum to us so it only took seconds to get everything back into the cases when we were done. Only problem was I zipped one bag in the zipper and ruined it. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: Weak bags
customer_reviews.text: The thing about this It can be an amazing product but when you get defective bag it ruins it. I know you have the lifetime warranty But why do I have to use it the first week I buy the product smh. Lucky I told amazon to send me another one an switch the defective bags. Like it’s easy you use it come with a pump but the bags are weak.
customer_reviews.author: ELVIN

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product in the past and was not very happy when half the bags had a leak. Thought I had a bad batch and ordered them again, but the same thing. The Lifetime Replacement is a joke, because I wrote to them using the information on the bag, but no one sent a reply to me when I bought your product the first time. They should only receive half a star from me as being a satisfied customer with their product but it will not allow me to do so.
customer_reviews.author: firefly32798

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are in process of moving and these bags are invaluable for packing and storing our blankets and quilts. Our king size quilt and 6 pillow shams easily fit in one large bag and, when vacuumed, shrunk down to the size of a bath towel. Our down comforter fit easily into a jumbo bag. These bags are great and we highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service. Received a couple that didn’t maintain it’s volume. Contacted CS and they were quick to respond to give advice and replaced the product when it didn’t work. Must have for storage. I am able to squeeze a full size mattress topper in the biggest bag and now I can store it easily when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Organizing!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar does a wonderful job at not only being visually pleasing but making sure to have a good space for writing. The boxes are cleared and are lined for better spacing. All of the designs for each month are done in extraordinary detail. This is a large wall calendar and being a college students, greatly helped in my case of tracking everything going on in my life. Would highly recommend if you have been looking for a well designed wall calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Su-B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Our dyson doesn't fit the hole on these. I figured that was no big deal since we have a shop vac. That one doesn't fit either. Once we got the bags all vacuumed flat and sealed up I was pretty happy with them even though we had to force the vacuuming part to work. Unfortunately when I looked at the bags again a few days later they had already started swelling back up.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: How did I go half my life without using this? I purchased this product to see how well it would store seasonal clothes and linens and I was very pleasantly surprised. It's easy to use and actually does what it claims to do. I plan to use the smaller bags to pack for air travel. I also love that I'm able to reuse the bags. I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Falahee

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is good and bad.
customer_reviews.text: Storage capacity is excellent. We were about to pack a week’s worth of clothes for a trip for two people and even have extra clothes for emergency. Only downside, after a month some of the bags leaked. Some of the bags are still vacuumed that I have used for storage of other clothes. I would purchase again but a smaller amount and hope the seal last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great service
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I got these space saver bags to help organize my almost 1 year old’s closet as she had quite a bit of clothes that are too small and even some that are still too big. One of the jumbo bags I received was defective. I went to the website listed on the bag to put in a claim for their lifetime replacement guarantee and someone contacted me within 2 hours for my address so they could send me a replacement no questions asked. A few days later I received my replacement. The customer service was amazing and having a lifetime replacement guarantee makes them worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far.... Storage bags look of quality material, design and workmanship. Had issue with the large bags leaking but after several attempts, they seem to be working fine now. I did contact the seller and they responded in a timely manner. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: GreyColt

customer_reviews.title: Such a huge help with moving and a brand new baby on the way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: True life saver in the midst of welcoming a new baby, complete with a lot of hand-me down clothes AND a move across the state. The bag sizes all have great variety and gold just about everything. The jumbo fits two of my king size bed duvet covers and three kind size blankets. The small and mediums are perfect for organizing the baby onesies into size ranges, and the mediums and larger are perfect for towels!!! Such a help when packing and organizing to move!!
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Durable and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are wonderful! I bought two different brands because I was skeptical how durable they’d be but they are by far the better choice. For the price, there is a great variety of sizes and the bags are thick and durable. I have had no issues and will continue to buy this brand in the future. I was able to compress an entire hall closet full to the max of pillows and blankets to just one shelf-amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Estein

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use vacuum bags more for storage than travel. These have been hands-down the most durable and the vacuum lasts longer than for other brands. I've tried the Ziploc ones (the top part that closes tends to tear after a year or two) and Eagle Creek (probably better for traveling as they're lighter-weight). Spacesaver won for my purposes (durability and maintaining vacuum).
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Putzel

customer_reviews.title: No return for defective product
customer_reviews.text: The bags didn't work--they unseal every time we try to use them (even when I hardly fill them at all--certainly not past the line), and the manufacturer's website, which is supposed to be the place you can go to get replacements if they don't work, is gone. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kambria McLean

customer_reviews.title: Follow Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: These work good and hold their suction as long as you don't overfill. I've leaned That I actually have to stay below the fill line most of the time. But as long as you do that, they work really good. I just will they had bigger sizes. I have a king size comforter that I like putting away for the summer, but It does not fit in the largest size. You have to be below the fill line WITHOUT squishing whatever you put inside for it to keep suction.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: disappointed is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: Having read several reviews, I chose this item to purchase- I have had mixed success with vacuum bags but they are still incredibly useful when moving. Nevertheless, the quality/consistency of this product sucks. 50% of bags reinflated within 30mins of packing (50%!) Im also using bags Ive had for a few years (which have done several moves) and they hold up better than this new batch. Sad days
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Good for moving
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought another brand that freaking leaked and expanded, so far have not had a problem with these leaking air, yay! We’re moving our house and these bags are really helping save space with clothes and towels when packing! They do condense a bunch of light weight clothes/towels/linens into a heavy brick, but then we can get more in a box. I would definitely buy these things again.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great when not defective
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe these bags are if not the best bags in the industry then top two. They just work. The only down side is that I have already two big bags that have micro tears it in them from just getting succsion. I naught a box of twelve and so far two have gone bad in less than a month. So the ration is bad as to how many I baught. Overall really good bages. Only down side is when they don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: FSJR

customer_reviews.title: Changed my closet space
customer_reviews.text: I was able to vacuum seal almost my entire winter wardrobe save a few coats! I used every bag and only one didn't work. Not a big deal to me since every other one was fine! I used the hand pump that the bags came with to suck the air out and it worked well and didn't take forever. I would recommend following their instructions and not putting anything in past the dotted line on the bag. I threw in 2 dryer sheets per bag just so nothing came out smelling like an attic.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the space in these to hold blankets, clothes...etc., the only problem is that, once I store them in closet or whatever, seems after a few months, they lose their vacuum. I end up redoing the vacuum, but after awhile, it does it again(loses air)....so, I just, because I like the size for my things, just deal with it (sigh).
customer_reviews.author: jimd2k

customer_reviews.title: They Work Great !!
customer_reviews.text: We are planning a cruise and needed something to store our bulky jackets and such as we are headed to Alaska. So far we've used 3 of the bags and vacuumed them without fail. If they leak there guaranteed to be replaced what more could you ask for. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: J R Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, not so much in the end.
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with their product when I first got it. Then I realized that the quality of the bags themselves were not as great as I thought it would be. One wouldn’t seal properly so kept inflating. A second one ripped! I had tried to place a follow in it, I realized the pillow took way too much space so I removed it and tried to place in a pair of throw blankets and it ripped at where it had been folded to fit in the shipment box. This was all in the first days. So it can’t be attributed to wear and tear. Overall I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Most of them are meeting expectations/superior customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of the bags. I use 6 rigth away and one was defective. There was a place were the air was escaping on the side of the bag. I am in the process of contacting seller I hope they will answer it in is one of the big ones. I changed my review from 4 stars to 5 stars since I was contacted by seller and I was sent a replacement bag . I love when companies honor their commitment to their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this variety pack
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a ton of these along with different brands (incase they didn’t work) and all of the “larges” from this box deflated within a day. I would only buy small or medium.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Van Keuren

customer_reviews.title: so much in such a tiny space
customer_reviews.text: I can fit my entire winter wardrobe in one bag and store it on top of my closet. It is incredibly easy to get everything in one of these bags, zip it up and use a vacuum to shrink everything into a tiny little easy pack. The quality of these bags are great and I trust them to hold up to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tov

customer_reviews.title: great! I'm not sure the vacuum was happy about ...
customer_reviews.text: great! I'm not sure the vacuum was happy about doing this...sounded like it was angry. The sucked-down bags are hard. I suppose it takes practice to get it molded in the right shape to fit in a predefined space. I traded a pillow-shape for this sucked-down hard star shaped bag. It's not taking up that much less room if you consider the irregular shape requires more storage space.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Not good for traveling. Was moving out of state decided to use these and bought the jumbo pack of 15, they all stayed closed however they all reinflated from baggage handling. I made sure to seal them and make sure they didn’t reinflate a week before we left to airport and it made our duffle bags open while on plane because they were overstuffed from bags reinflating. Very disappointed in purchase especially spending the $45 during a move with an infant. Could of used money to bring one more bag at airport for that much. Not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie kunz

customer_reviews.title: We've had only one bag that didn't like to hold its vacuum without a bit of tinkering
customer_reviews.text: These were very handy as we downsized from our 2100 sq/ft home to our 295 sq/ft fifth wheel. Seldom used blankets/bedding and winter coats take up far less storage space which is highly valuable in our new home. We bought a variety pack of sizes which worked well for us. We've had only one bag that didn't like to hold its vacuum without a bit of tinkering. All the others worked very well. I like that you can use them, remove an item or two and then reseal and vacuum out the air again. Over and over. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: If the bag works at all, it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 20-bag variety pack to help with moving out of state and was so excited to get the most out of our space. Most of my bags worked great! The bags that worked were a 5 star for sure; however, not every bag works. I followed all of the instructions and still a few of my bags leaked after a few days. I do have one bag (the first one I packed) that has been packed for nearly a month and is still as tight as it was on day one. Honestly, if they all work, they’re great, but consider planning on having a few that don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY. Air gets in within 12 hrs
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these to last longer than 12 hrs as we have many clothes to be stored in storage for 2 years. After shrinking it, I kept the bag in box and since it had space left the box was open for 12 hrs and now I see air is filled in. You can clearly see the difference when air is vacuumed out and after 12 hrs. I bought 2 packages and don’t know what to do with them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Overall thought I would be thrilled about this product but it just didn't meet my expectations. I have vacummed sealed several different size of bags and just after a couple of weeks they continuously deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pierren

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and defective.
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-use and pretty straight forward. However, after a month I found out that their "Triple-Seal Turbo Valve[s] are designed to get every ounce of air OUT of the bag in the suction process – and nothing gets back in" statement is a complete joke. Had two bags completely reinflate, as BOTH [fancy words for ineffective one-way valve] leak and let air in. Both valves leak with and without the cover (one-way valves shouldn't need covers to work properly). The other bags seem serviceable. Yours may be fine as long as the cheap-ass plastic valves hold out.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I packed 3 comforters and I used the hand pump. I was able to vacuum out the air easily and fairly quickly, and have seen no evidence of leakage after 3 days. Using these bags made storage of these comforters much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Sear

customer_reviews.title: The possiblity of using my vaccum cleaner to deflate the bags.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had was that my vaccum cleaner hose ends did not fit the bag opening. I tried the small shop vac and still no fit. I had to use an adaptor from the cleaning blind vaccum apparatus with tape to fit. I did not want to use the hand held. My advise is to suppy a graduated piece so that the end of the vaccum hose fits one end and the other end the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha E. Arenas

customer_reviews.title: Saved Me Lots Of Money For My Move!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bags instead of boxes for our move , stacked well and able to place bags sideways to fit more in car. Do not pack over the STOP line. Wrapped my TV with a comforter, placed my wine glasses between clothes,wrapped my bose sound bar/DVD in towels. NOTE: vacuum sealed loosely, enough to flatten. All worked well ! This was for a short cross country move. Easier to move with my trolley dolly!
customer_reviews.author: DREAMER

customer_reviews.title: Good storage bags.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried these for first time. What a fantastic product! My quilts, blankets, comforters, and pillows now use 1/4 storage space as before and will stay dust-free. My closets are neat and organized with more room. Great quality, they've held the suction over a month so far and I expect no leaks now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: You can seriously buy better vacuum storage bags at the dollar store
customer_reviews.text: Bags are extremely flimsy. I'm not manhandling these bags, all I did was vacuum seal them and place them on my storage shelf. That apparently is too much stress for the bags, since nearly all of mine ended up with tiny tears in them. Or maybe the tears were there to begin with. Either way, all but 2 of my 12 bags are now unusable. You can seriously buy better vacuum storage bags at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: All but one bag didn’t worked . I didn’t overstuff either but my bag (bedding) fluffed up after a few days in the closet (or I only noticed it a few days later when I went back into it). The bags that do work keeps my winter coats and blankets stored away in a nice compact flat size that fit into a large cardboard box for. I guess I had a bad batch??
customer_reviews.author: LiaLia

customer_reviews.title: Yay!- Extra Storage!
customer_reviews.text: After down-sizing, we were trying to find extra space for my clothes. Going from two large walk-in closets down to two tiny walk-in clos. My husband suggested I use these bags to store my winter wardrobe and these bags are wonderful! I used the vacuum to suck out the air vs. the pump (included) The pump is a joke unless, you need an arm workout. It’s just like you are “freeze drying“ your clothing, blankets, comforters or pillows. Be sure to use the little blue clips to zip close the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing blankets and clothing
customer_reviews.text: Getting organized couldn't be easier. Very pleased with the quality. Went with SpaceSaver after reading all the reviews of different brands. This brand is by far the best. Don't be cheap and buy the others as you will be disappointed. Great value and love the variety of bag sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Defective bags but served its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Gave it three stars because 5 out the 12 bags are defective. We tried everything we could to make sure there was no leak and listened carefully and we thought we were good but the next day we go back and the bags were inflated again. Disappointed but the ones that did work are amazing. Saves you tons of space.
customer_reviews.author: Shaheda Ali

customer_reviews.title: Improved Button Design
customer_reviews.text: I used these to organize a bathroom closet. Right now I am using mostly the medium, large and jumbo sizes so I haven't really used the travel size yet. I had some of the older style bags that I had forgotten about when I started my project. I found the newer-designed button on the newest bags much easier to use than the older version. This makes it much easier to vacuum the air out and get on to the next bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome variety of sizes in one box!
customer_reviews.text: I can always use a wide variety of storage bag sizes throughout the year, from storing the guest pillows after the grandchildren sleep over, to storing off-season clothing, to sealing clothing and bedding for campouts and so much more. They really do hold their vacuum until YOU decide to release it. I have been through many other brand name vacuum storage bags that didn't stay sealed and was just out of patience and money. I will only purchase Spacesaver brand in the future for three reasons: the product is true to its advertising, the pricing is comparable to other similar products on the market and they back their product with a 100% Lifetime Guarantee. Can't beat that folks!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this specific purchase, but I have used the space bags size jumbo and so far (1 week since using some), I loved the space these bags made by sucking all the air out. I used my vacuum cleaner to do that work. That's why I decided to purchase this box of multi sizes. I'm hoping those work justs as well as the jumbos.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Travel capacity made easy
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews here to consider what product would work best for travelling situation. These vacuum bags are well built, especially this combo box that gives different sizes to cater to many packing configurations. The included vacuum pump is a bonus and works like a charm. Glad I found these bags, my packing has never been more organized.
customer_reviews.author: theHitman

customer_reviews.title: Great storage helpers
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags for storing pillows ,comforters and blankets since I have limited closet space. They are pretty easy to use but occasionally I do have a little trouble with the seal but I just redo the sealing . I’ve only used these once when I traveled but they do help so that you don’t need that bigger suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: south paw

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. No leaks, easy to use. Once all the air is out, bag with clothes becomes ridged and takes up far less space. We've stored our blankets, half our clothes (so far), suits, jackets, shirts, sweaters, scarves, etc and the bags have performed better than expected! We highly recommend these for anyone traveling/moving to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Spacesaver Premium Vacuum Storage Bags (3 x Small, 3 x Medium, 3 x Large, 3 x Jumbo) (80% More Storage Than Leading Brands) Free Hand Pump for Travel! (Variety 12 Pack)
feature_bullets: 12 x PREMIUM VARIETY PACK OF VACUUM STORAGE BAGS FOR A RANGE OF ITEMS! Store away your duvet, bed sheets, towels, blankets, and more! 80% more space than other bags on the market!

SQUEEZES EVERY BIT OF AIR OUT OF THE BAG! The unique Double-Zip Seal and the Triple-Seal Turbo Valve are designed to get every ounce of air OUT of the bag in the suction process – and nothing gets back in! Other storage bags let air back in, and defeat the purpose. Not these!

INCREASE YOUR STORAGE SPACE without having to clean out your closet! Our Spacesaver bags are an ideal solution for adding more storage space to your wardrobes, closets, garages, basements, lofts, and suitcases.

FREE TRAVEL PUMP INCLUDED! When you’re travelling and want the MOST space so you don’t have to take a lot of luggage, these storage bags are PERFECT! And when you have to re-pack for the return trip, just use our FREE convenient Travel Pump, and your bags will be air-tight vacuum-packed again!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,064 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
